subject: Cord Wrapping Issue - BLD-150 Everyday Dryer
body:
Dear Support Team,

I purchased a BreezeLite BLD-150 Everyday Dryer on March 20, 2026, and it stopped working after just 2 months.

I always wrap the power cord tightly around the dryer body for storage as I don't have much space in my bathroom cabinet. Recently, when I plugged it in, I noticed sparks coming from the power plug area and the dryer no longer turns on.

I believe the issue is caused by internal wire damage from the cord being wrapped around the unit. I have the receipt and would like to file a warranty claim for a replacement.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Sarah Thompson
sarah.thompson@email.com
